Wonderful game if you love half-life you'll love opposing force!
A fun expansion to the Half Life universe. Its longer than Blue Shift and provides new enemies and weapons. Overall I enjoyed it more and it added to the lore with the character of Adrian Shephard.
Whatta hell this isnt gordon freeman... just a damn bootboy...

Essa expans√£o me surpreendeu. Eu joguei ela ap√≥s o Blue Shift e eu esperava basicamente mais do mesmo, mas ela apresentou muita coisa nova (incluindo armas e inimigos)

S√≥ n√£o gostei do flood de ninjas em um dos capitulos finais, mas fora isso √© uma expans√£o excelente. Recomendo jogar ap√≥s zerar o original e o Blue Shift

There was a nether portal.

I refuse to elaborate further.

Played Blue Shift first, expected around the same bar of quality, but this was much more "complete." It almost felt like a Half-Life sequel, and it stands alone very well. Unlike Blue Shift, which had a lot of frustrating moments that required finesse and luck (i.e. finding that one hidden ladder, or arranging boxes just precisely so that it can be jumped on), this one seemed like it was tested many more times for QA. It was for the most part, much more entertaining. I loved seeing some aliens not present in any of the other HL games. And, SPOILER:


Nice to see a Gordon Freeman cameo that actually alludes to a moment in the first Half-Life.

Muy bueno, igual de divertido que Half-Life, la variedad de armas es muy buena y con mec√°nicas como la visi√≥n nocturna, los nuevos tipos de aliens y de zombies, hacen que es el juego no se sienta igual y la verdad es una excelente expansi√≥n de Half-Life.
Very good, even though it is very easy to get lost and know where to go at some parts it deserve some credit
pretty cool game, lots of new weapons and places to explore
its a good fun if you've played black mesa or the og half-life
A D R I A N S H E P A R D
i got trauma from this game
It's just more Half-Life. If you liked the original you'll probably like this one. Very solid game, even like 20 years after its release

Honestly, I wish there would just be a sequel to this add on at this point, I love it so much. Opposing Force builds off of what Half Life was and boy it does not disappoint (except maybe in the final boss. It wasn't BAD, just sorta mediocre, which is jarring against the rest of this masterpiece. 

I love the new weapons variety, the character designs, the new assets and set pieces, heck, even Shepherd's little idle animations with some of his living weapons is kinda cute and attentive to detail.


All in all, if you love Half Life, you'd be missing out on a LOT to not play this game.
Super fun and semi challenging  game. there are some annoying parts mainly when your in a room with a bunch of tough enemies but its not to bad i like this game a lot and it is a must play
Im not sure why but i dont really like this one compared to blue shift but it is still good none the less.
